Title: Chief Executive Officer
Description: CEO, Lead Developer, Bytus Technologies  •  Engineered a cutting-edge payment reconciliation solution that automated financial processes, saving the finance team 15 hours weekly while enhancing accuracy in reporting by 25% through real-time cash flow tracking.  •  Designed and executed a structured feedback collection process that facilitated actionable insights from clients, resulting in a 25% improvement in customer satisfaction scores and driving product innovation across the organization.  •  Established a high-performance culture that fostered collaboration among a diverse team of 10 engineers and designers; resulted in the successful launch of 5 new features, driving user engagement to an impressive 40% increase.  Implemented Solutions:   •  Analyzed over 100 vulnerabilities in online transactions, implementing a strategic risk assessment framework that bolstered compliance with industry regulations and enhanced the security posture by 50%, ensuring robust customer trust.  •  Developed a comprehensive automated billing solution that streamlined transaction processing to over 10,000 per month, resulting in a 30% boost in operational efficiency and enabling the finance team to focus on strategic initiatives.  •   Spearheaded the design and implementation of a secure mobile payment solution, enabling integration with existing merchant platforms and facilitating the processing of over 1,500 transactions daily with a 99.9% uptime rate.  •  Orchestrated a blockchain implementation that delivered enhanced transaction visibility for 2,500 users; established a foundation for improved customer interactions, resulting in higher customer satisfaction scores across the board.

Title: Chief Technology Officer
Description: CTO, Global Digital Payment Provider  •Engineered a cutting-edge digital payment platform with robust multi-currency support, enhancing user experience and increasing transaction volume by 25% within the first six months of deployment.  • Initiated and led efforts to align technology initiatives with strategic business goals, culminating in the launch of three innovative payment features that increased the average transaction volume by 25% within the first quarter.  • Championed the development of a digital payment platform that supports 150+ currencies, leading to improved transaction speeds, which enhanced user satisfaction and positioned the company as a market leader in payment solutions.  Senior Developer, Digital Payment Gateway | Mar 2018- Dec 2018 • 9 mos  • Devised a robust payment processing strategy that improved authorization times for real-time transactions, resulting in a reduction of transaction failures by 15% and a notable increase in repeat customer engagement.  • Implemented data-driven insights to refine risk management strategies, enhancing transaction verification processes and positively impacting service response times, which now average under 30 seconds for potential fraud alerts.  • Executed the implementation of an advanced payment system with three third-party providers, extending service coverage to five new countries and achieving a 25% increase in market reach while elevating customer satisfaction metrics.  Skills:  •Technical Expertise: Java, Spring Boot, Kotlin, Android, iOS, AWS, Azure, Blockchain  •Leadership and Management: Team building, mentoring, project management, stakeholder engagement  •Strategic Thinking: Product development, technology roadmap planning, market analysis  •Global Mindset: Understanding of diverse regulatory frameworks and cultural nuances in digital payments
